src_original: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca /  gauravaṃ mahārāja viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartate /  yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti //  nirmānatā mahārāja viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartate /  yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati //
tatra katamā śraddhā /  yathā śraddhāyāś caturo dharmān abhiśraddadhāti /
tgt_original: 沙門瞿曇信根者，信於四法。

src_original: saṃsārāvacarīṃ laukikīṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ śraddadhāti /  sa karmavipākapratiśaraṇo bhavati /  yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /  sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
tgt_original: 一者、於生死中，行施正見，信於業報，乃至奪命終不作惡故；

src_original: bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti /  taccaryāpratipannaś cānyatra yāne spṛhāṃ notpādayati /
tgt_original: 二者、信菩薩行，不隨諸見，專求菩提，不求餘乘故；
三者、信解諸法同空、無相、無願，同第一義，同於了義甚深因緣，無我、無人、無眾生，無有分別故；

src_original: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
tgt_original: 四者、信一切佛十力、四無畏、十八不共法。

src_original: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /  idam ucyate śraddhendriyam //
tgt_original: 如是信已，除諸疑網，集一切佛法，是名信根。

src_original: tatra katamad vīryendriyaṃ /  yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
tgt_original: 「大王當知！ 沙門瞿曇精進根者，若法信根所攝，是法即為精進根修，是名精進根。

src_original: tatra katamat smṛtīndriyaṃ /  yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /  idam ucyate smṛtīndriyam //
tgt_original: 若法精進根所攝，是法終不忘失，是名念根； 若法念根所攝，是法不忘不失，一心不亂，是名定根；
